name: Bubble Shooter Pop!
description:
Welcome to Bubble Shooter Pop! - a brand new addictive bubble shooter game by MobilityWare! No pop-ups, no gimmicks, and no in-app purchases. Enjoy endless free classic bubble shooter levels and hours of fun. Relax your mind in this meditative yet challenging bubble pop game!

Match 3 colors, break tricky obstacles and use rechargeable power-ups to beat joyful and challenging levels. Special bubbles will enhance the gameplay: some of them are hard to overcome, others are a player’s best friend!

It is the most joyous bubble shooter game on the App Store. A thoughtful, relaxing, friction-free experience with endless play! Come along now and join the fun!

KEY FEATURES
• Train your brain with thousands of colorful and unique levels
• Enjoy unlimited replays - no time outs or limited lives like in other games
• Lots of special bubbles and obstacles await you!
• Power-Ups recharge on every level - no more in-app purchases!
• Hone your skills on challenge levels
• No WiFi needed. Play offline anytime anywhere!
• Joyous, smooth gameplay!



Easy to learn but difficult to master. Start popping right now! Try this fun casual bubble shooter game: aim, shoot and blast all the balls. Experience endless exciting levels, powerful boosters, and awesome features!
